column4: Ya know, I always wondered what the difference between .bashrc and bash_profile was.
Can anybody help me with this disappearing wireless card thing?
Maybe I should just reinstall ubuntu.
Hm, how re-install friendly is ubuntu?
Okay, then can you help me fix it?
puff : i dont know anything about wireless cards
I am pretty much stuck.  http://pastebin.com/362649
make HappyFool help you, he knows linux well
I'm not sure that's a "wireless"problem per se, but rather that ubuntu comes up (resume from disk) and can't load the firmware or something.
